original: 陳郡柘縣人，曹魏官員。出任地方官皆有治績，因而得到曹操賞識，提拔為并州刺史。在任其間政績卓越，選賢舉能、威服蠻夷，前後無人可以與之相提並論。
text: Chen Junzhe County native, Cao Wei official. Serving as local officials all have governance achievements, so they were appreciated by Cao Cao and promoted to the provincial governor. During his tenure, he has outstanding political achievements, capable of selecting the best and able to dominate the barbarians, no one can compare with them.
